name: Movies With Ward Bond Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Bond had a small (but amusing) role in "It Happened One Night". What did his character repeatedly say?
questions.explanation:
Oh, yeah?.

	Bond, a bus driver, gets into a "battle of wits" with Clark Gable. (Bond probably didn't find it too difficult to remember his lines.)

questions.text: Bond appeared on several occasions with John Wayne. What was Bond's role in "Tall in the Saddle"?
questions.explanation:
Bad Guy.

	This early John Wayne western wasn't bad. Bond plays a judge who isn't on the up-and-up.

questions.text: Bond also appeared with John Wayne in "Rio Bravo". What happened to his character?
questions.explanation:
Murdered.

	Bond is shot and killed early in the movie for befriending Wayne. This is another good movie; it includes Angie Dickinson and Dean Martin in the cast.

questions.text: "The Unconquered" had Bond supporting a different leading man. Who was it?
questions.explanation:
Gary Cooper.

	Gary Cooper and Paulette Goddard starred in this enjoyable adventure. Howard Da Silva has a fine turn as the villain; Boris Karloff appears as an Indian.

questions.text: Bond appeared in "The Long Voyage Home"; the movie was based on what author's works?
questions.explanation:
Eugene O'Neill.

	The movie was based on O'Neill's play of the same name, but also incorporated elements of O'Neill's other seagoing stories.

questions.text: Bond appeared in the classic "Maltese Falcon". What was his role?
questions.explanation:
Policeman.

	Bond and Barton Maclane question Bogart about the death of Bogart's partner. Bond is also on the receiving end of the last line by Bogart (and the last line in the movie): "the stuff that dreams are made of".

questions.text: Bond plays a preacher/lawman in this John Wayne movie.
questions.explanation:
The Searchers.

	Tough guy Wayne searches with Jeffrey Hunter for young Natalie Wood. This is one of Wayne's most famous movies. (The other choices are also Wayne movies.)

questions.text: What is Bond's role as a soldier in "Fort Apache" (which starred John Wayne and Henry Fonda)?
questions.correct: subordinate to both Wayne and Fonda
options: superior to Fonda, subordinate to Wayne
superior to Wayne, subordinate to Fonda
questions.explanation:
subordinate to both Wayne and Fonda.

	Fonda is the new commandant; Wayne is his subordinate. Bond is under both of them. John Agar and Shirley Temple are along for the ride.

questions.text: Bond also appeared in "Mister Roberts". Which of the following did NOT appear in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Edgar Buchanan.

	Edgar's not in this one. Powell is the doctor, Cagney is the skipper, Lemmon is Ensign Pulver. Henry Fonda plays the title role.

questions.text: Bond appeared in "It's A Wonderful Life". What character did he play?
questions.explanation:
Cop.

	He's a cop again; this time he always seems to be walking a beat. James Stewart and Donna Reed starred (of course).
